title: FaceApp (2017)
brief_description: FaceApp is a mobile application for iOS and Android developed by Russian company Wireless Lab. The app generates highly realistic transformations of faces in photographs by using neural networks based on artificial intelligence.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.
